item.description:
Time to be Cave Men and Cave Women eating cave food...

breathe hard, grunt and pull hair..ok poop in the woods too...hey they did it...

This is a famous cave and we are going to make it INFAMOUS..

getting there:
Meet at the trail head 2 pm..

from waterbury..take 8 north to exit #38, follow to waterbury rd..
then take a left onto Pine Hill Road, then a left onto rte 6 south...
you will pass black rock park on the right..go up the hill till the guard rail stops and look for a small sandy pull off area and an old trail marker in the tree, look on both sides of the road..i think one side had it and the other didnt..

For Mapquest, GPS or other..use 1500 Thomaston Road Watertown for a real close parking location...

Im leaving my home at 1:00 pm...

AL Kaboom

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: 41*38'22.07N,73*05'17.68W@698 CAVE EXPLORATION, Dinner After also
